column1: # SOURCE: Synthetic data for community agri-PV model
# DESCRIPTION: Community building types with energy and water demand profiles
# ASSUMPTIONS: Hot arid climate requires some cooling/ventilation
# ASSUMPTIONS: Non-residential buildings have lower per-m² demand than housing
# ASSUMPTIONS: Office space has highest energy (AC/lighting)
# ASSUMPTIONS: Water use primarily for sanitation and cleaning

column5: AC units; LED lighting; computers; printers; small fridge; water cooler

column5: Ventilation fans; minimal lighting; occasional power tool use

column2: Community gathering space with basic amenities
